QuestData.Title: Kor'thik Aggression
QuestData.Description: I'm no brewer - just looking at all those heaps of ingredients makes my head spin. Just put the brew in front of me when it's finished, thank you.$b$bNo, I'm here to make sure that the brewers don't get cut in half while they're trying to make that perfect brew. It's not an easy job.$b$bThe Kor'thik mantid across this basin have been attacking us nightly. If you're already heading over there, why don't you return the favor and attack a few of them?
QuestData.RewardText: You've got the makings of a fine brewgarden guard, $r. Let me know if you ever get tired of the whole "$c" thing.
